title: I CANT JOIN LOL HELP PLEASE
body:
hello guys, after I bought PC i started downloading LOL and after i downloaded it i started updateing this game and I am currently at 33% and can't go more.
It says this: ,,_Unspecified error occured. Please check the logs for more information_''

replies.body: Getting an unspecified error at 33% suggests a network problem failing to connect to the patching servers.  Without that connection being established you won't be able to download updates.  Go through the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot this.  Let me know if you have any questions about that.
